History

Windows Edition
1.3 Test build 2 Added score counter
Test build 5 Shrank font size of scoure counter
Release candidate 2 Unspecified bugfixes
1.4 Snapshot 3a Removed score counter

Score counter
Type User Interface element
Position Top right
Introduced 1.3 Test build 2 - 19th June 2020
Removed 1.4  Snapsht 3a - 30th December 2020
